data.title: Per Anhalter durch die Galaxis (Kino) am 25.05.2024 in Berlin - Rausgegangen
data.meta_description: Per Anhalter durch die Galaxis (Kino) am 25.05.2024 in Berlin ►  Alle Infos & Tickets auf Rausgegangen!
data.text:
In the organizer's words:

Arthur Dent is having a bad day. Not only does he have to watch his house being flattened, he also learns that his best friend is an alien and that the earth is to be blown up to make way for a new space highway. But the end of the world is just the beginning for Arthur. A passing spaceship takes him along by chance and he quickly learns the really important things in life and beyond: towels are the most useful objects of all, the meaning of life is a piece of cake, and everything else can be found in the travel guide "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy".

Special for Towel Day on May 25: If you come with a towel or in a bathrobe, you pay the reduced ticket price!

This content has been machine translated.

Price information:

9 € regular, 7 € reduced
